Study Title: Randomized Study Comparing CMF and Goserelin + Tamoxifen in Premenopausal Receptor-positive Patients
Brief Summary: Primarily, this clinical investigation compared the efficacy of cyclophosphamide + methotrexate + fluorouracil chemotherapy vs. goserelin + tamoxifen treatment in terms of prognosis (disease-free survival, overall survival) in premenopausal patients with potentially curative, operated hormone receptor-positive breast cancer.
Interventions: DRUG: Cyclophosphamide|DRUG: Methotrexate|DRUG: Fluorouracil implant|DRUG: Goserelin|DRUG: Tamoxifen
Sponsor: Austrian Breast & Colorectal Cancer Study Group
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
